Zachariah or Zacharias__05.1: And I turned and lifted up my eyes: and I saw, and behold <u>a volume</u> flying.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.2: And he said to me: What seest thou? And I said: I see a volume flying: the length thereof is twenty cubits, and the breadth thereof ten cubits.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.3: And he said to me: This is the curse that goeth forth over the face of the earth: for every thief shall be judged as is there written: and every one that sweareth in like manner shall be judged by it.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.4: I will bring it forth, saith the Lord of hosts: and it shall come to the house of the thief, and to the house of him that sweareth falsely by my name: and it shall remain in the midst of his house, and shall consume it, with the timber thereof, and the stones thereof.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.5: And the angel went forth that spoke in me, and he said to me: Lift up thy eyes, and see what this is, that goeth forth.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.6: And I said: What is it? And he said: This is a vessel going forth. And he said: <u>This is their eye</u> in all the earth.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.7: And behold a talent of lead was carried, and behold a woman sitting in the midst of the vessel.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.8: And he said: This is wickedness. And he cast her into the midst of the vessel, and cast the weight of lead upon the mouth thereof.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.9: And I lifted up my eyes and looked: and behold there came out two women, and wind was in their wings, and they had wings like the wings of a kite: and they lifted up the vessel between the earth and the heaven.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.10: And I said to the angel that spoke in me: Whither do these carry the vessel?
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.11: And he said to me: That a house may be built for it in <u>the land of Sennaar</u>, and that it may be established, and set there upon its own basis.
